mapper.insert: insert into user(user_name, user_password, user_class, integral, email, student_no, creation_time) value (#{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userClass}, #{integral}, #{email}, #{studentNo}, now())
mapper.select: select * from user where student_no = #{0} and user_password = #{1} or email = #{0} and user_password = #{1}
select * from user where email = #{0} and student_no = #{1}
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName}, user_class = #{userClass}, student_no = #{studentNo} where id = #{id}
